items.title: Ads: New placement for mobile
items.description: When setting up ads you can now use the placement `Dropzone` to make sure ads are placed between rows on mobile. Use `index` to specify the row-number.

items.title: Automatically set publish date on rows
items.description: If you publish an article in the future you can search for it in the article list (hotkey `A`) and add it to a page. Labrador will now automatically set a publish date on the row the article is added to to prevent displaying it until the article will be visible. If you add several articles with a future publish date the last date will be set on the row.

items.title: Auto-update article lists
items.description: The article list (hotkey `A`) is now automatically updated every 30 seconds to keep you up to date with newly published articles on your sites.

items.title: Subarticle-options
items.description: The options are moved from the subarticles to the article-teaser. This allows you to choose to display or hide images (default visible), titles (default visible) and subtitles (default hidden) for all subarticles in one place.

items.title: Added Timelines
items.description: You can now include timelines in your articles or front-pages to display a chronological list of events. To start: Open the Content-collection (hotkey `C`), search for 'timeline' and drag and drop the timeline onto a page.

items.title: Overlay images
items.description: You can now add one or more images overlaying the header image of articles and image in article teasers. If you publish a comment, for example, you can add a portrait of the author floating on top of the main image. To use in the article-header or teasers: Click the Media options and select Display extra images. A dropzone will now display. You can drag and drop images here. You can use the menu of the image to select placement: Top left, top right (default), bottom left and bottom right. Use the color-picker to set a border if needed.

items.title: More options for subarticles
items.description: Subarticles can now display with a compact design. Each subarticle can display optional image, title and subtitle. To add subarticles to an article teaser, click the hamburger-dropdown / Subarticles and select Toggle subarticles. Here you can also select Compact design. A compact design will display text and images with a smaller size and with less whitespace.

items.title: Language support for Toplist
items.description: The Toplist-element will now display date-strings for each article using localised strings. You can override strings for any site and language in the admin-page.

items.title: Improved Article List
items.description: The element `Article List` can now display images left, right or centered in 100% width. The settings panel (hotkey `,`) also let you specify number of columns for the articles in desktop and mobile. You can also drop images onto each article to add or change the image.

items.title: Better linking-tool in bodytext-editor
items.description: If you have a text selection and select the menu 'Insert / Article-link' the tool will now use the selection for the link text. If you have no selection the title of the article is used for the link text.

items.title: Default values for link tool
items.description: Text tools that allows inserting links can now set a default value for the checkbok 'Open in new tab'. You can set the default value from the settings-page.

items.title: Defer font loading to imporve SEO and page loading speed
items.description: You can now choose to defer font loading to after page has loaded, to improve page load speeds and SEO. It might lead to a flash of wrong font, so can worsen user experience.

items.title: Article-teasers: Display all images from original article
items.description: You can now display and use any image from an article without searching for them. In the menu of an article teaser, click the Media-dropdown and select Display images from article (or hotkey Shift+M) to display the images. You can then drag and drop any of them onto the article-teaser.

items.title: Hide row in a viewport
items.description: You can now also select to hide a row in a viewport as you can with other content-types. Example: To hide a row on mobile, mouse over the row on the mobile viewport in the editor, click the hamburger-menu at the bottom of the row-menu and select Hide in current viewport.

items.title: Label for paywall-articles on social media and Google
items.description: You can now use the admin-pages to choose if the string `(+)` will be hidden from the article-title when sharing an article on social media or Google. If not hidden the label will be added to meta-tags in the head-section of your articles behind paywall. The default setting is to display the label.

items.title: Estimated read time and read progress bar
items.description: Possible to enable estimated read time and read progress bar in admin under 'Article Settings'

items.title: Possible to choose background and text color on page/article.
items.description: It's now possible to choose background and text color on the entire page / article / prototype under Settings -> Colors.

items.title: Article search can now be filtered to show only paywall articles.
items.description: You can now filter articles by the ones that are behind paywall only.
